alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 4:54AM CDT until June 12 at 5:45AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Jefferson County in southern Oklahoma... * Until 545 AM CDT. * At 454 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Addington, moving east-southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Waurika, Ringling, Addington, and Cornish. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
